# shinyscaffold

The goal of shinyscaffold is to provide a skeleton for user-tailored feedback.

## Installation


``` r
devtools::install_github("urwa/shinyscaffold")
```

## Running Shiny App (for sample data)


``` r
shinyscaffold::launchApp()
```
